message: The SDG_TARGET field for indicator 1-3-1, translated into all languages

data.en: 1.3 Implement, at the national level, adequate social protection measures and systems, for all, and by 2030 achieve substantial coverage of the poor and vulnerable 06
data.pt: 1.3 Implementar, ao nível nacional, medidas e sistemas de protecção social adequados, para todos, e até 2030 atingir a cobertura substancial dos pobres e vulneráveis
